<S>1161</S> The first<S>3391</S> day of the week<S>4521</S> cometh<S>2064</S> Mary<S>3137</S> Magdalene<S>3094</S> early<S>4404</S>, when it was<S>5607</S> yet<S>2089</S> dark<S>4653</S>, unto<S>1519</S> the sepulchre<S>3419</S>, and<S>2532</S> seeth<S>991</S> the stone<S>3037</S> taken away<S>142</S> from<S>1537</S> the sepulchre<S>3419</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> she runneth<S>5143</S>, and<S>2532</S> cometh<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> Simon<S>4613</S> Peter<S>4074</S>, and<S>2532</S> to<S>4314</S> the other<S>243</S> disciple<S>3101</S>, whom<S>3739</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> loved<S>5368</S>, and<S>2532</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, They have taken away<S>142</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> out of<S>1537</S> the sepulchre<S>3419</S>, and<S>2532</S> we know<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> where<S>4226</S> they have laid<S>5087</S> him<S>846</S>.
Peter<S>4074</S> therefore<S>3767</S> went forth<S>1831</S>, and<S>2532</S> that other<S>243</S> disciple<S>3101</S>, and<S>2532</S> came<S>2064</S> to<S>1519</S> the sepulchre<S>3419</S>.
So<S>1161</S> they ran<S>5143</S> both<S>1417</S> together<S>3674</S>: and<S>2532</S> the other<S>243</S> disciple<S>3101</S> did outrun<S>4390</S> <S>5032</S> Peter<S>4074</S>, and<S>2532</S> came<S>2064</S> first<S>4413</S> to<S>1519</S> the sepulchre<S>3419</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he stooping down<S>3879</S>, and looking in, saw<S>991</S> the linen clothes<S>3608</S> lying<S>2749</S>; yet<S>3305</S> went he<S>1525</S> not<S>3756</S> in<S>1525</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> cometh<S>2064</S> Simon<S>4613</S> Peter<S>4074</S> following<S>190</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> went<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the sepulchre<S>3419</S>, and<S>2532</S> seeth<S>2334</S> the linen clothes<S>3608</S> lie<S>2749</S>,
And<S>2532</S> the napkin<S>4676</S>, that<S>3739</S> was<S>2258</S> about<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> head<S>2776</S>, not<S>3756</S> lying<S>2749</S> with<S>3326</S> the linen clothes<S>3608</S>, but<S>235</S> wrapped together<S>1794</S> in<S>1519</S> a place<S>5117</S> by itself<S>1520</S> <S>5565</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> <S>3767</S> went in<S>1525</S> also<S>2532</S> that other<S>243</S> disciple<S>3101</S>, which<S>3588</S> came<S>2064</S> first<S>4413</S> to<S>1519</S> the sepulchre<S>3419</S>, and<S>2532</S> he saw<S>1492</S>, and<S>2532</S> believed<S>4100</S>.
For<S>1063</S> as yet<S>3764</S> they knew<S>1492</S> not<S>3764</S> the scripture<S>1124</S>, that<S>3754</S> he<S>846</S> must<S>1163</S> rise again<S>450</S> from<S>1537</S> the dead<S>3498</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> the disciples<S>3101</S> went away<S>565</S> again<S>3825</S> unto<S>4314</S> their own home<S>1438</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Mary<S>3137</S> stood<S>2476</S> without<S>1854</S> at<S>4314</S> the sepulchre<S>3419</S> weeping<S>2799</S>: and<S>3767</S> as<S>5613</S> she wept<S>2799</S>, she stooped down<S>3879</S>, and looked into<S>1519</S> the sepulchre<S>3419</S>,
And<S>2532</S> seeth<S>2334</S> two<S>1417</S> angels<S>32</S> in<S>1722</S> white<S>3022</S> sitting<S>2516</S>, the one<S>1520</S> at<S>4314</S> the head<S>2776</S>, and<S>2532</S> the other<S>1520</S> at<S>4314</S> the feet<S>4228</S>, where<S>3699</S> the body<S>4983</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> had lain<S>2749</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they<S>1565</S> say<S>3004</S> unto her<S>846</S>, Woman<S>1135</S>, why<S>5101</S> weepest thou<S>2799</S>? She saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Because<S>3754</S> they have taken away<S>142</S> my<S>3450</S> Lord<S>2962</S>, and<S>2532</S> I know<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> where<S>4226</S> they have laid<S>5087</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when she had<S>2036</S> thus<S>5023</S> said<S>2036</S>, she turned<S>4762</S> herself<S>1519</S> back<S>3694</S>, and<S>2532</S> saw<S>2334</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> standing<S>2476</S>, and<S>2532</S> knew<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> that<S>3754</S> it was<S>2076</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto her<S>846</S>, Woman<S>1135</S>, why<S>5101</S> weepest thou<S>2799</S>? whom<S>5101</S> seekest thou<S>2212</S>? She<S>1565</S>, supposing<S>1380</S> <S>3754</S> him to be<S>2076</S> the gardener<S>2780</S>, saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Sir<S>2962</S>, if<S>1487</S> thou<S>4771</S> have borne<S>941</S> him<S>846</S> hence<S>941</S>, tell<S>2036</S> me<S>3427</S> where<S>4226</S> thou hast laid<S>5087</S> him<S>846</S>, and I<S>2504</S> will take<S>142</S> him<S>846</S> away<S>142</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto her<S>846</S>, Mary<S>3137</S>. She<S>1565</S> turned<S>4762</S> herself, and saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Rabboni<S>4462</S>; which<S>3739</S> is to say<S>3004</S>, Master<S>1320</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto her<S>846</S>, Touch<S>680</S> me<S>3450</S> not<S>3361</S>; for<S>1063</S> I am<S>305</S> not yet<S>3768</S> ascended<S>305</S> to<S>4314</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S>: but<S>1161</S> go<S>4198</S> to<S>4314</S> my<S>3450</S> brethren<S>80</S>, and<S>2532</S> say<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, I ascend<S>305</S> unto<S>4314</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> your<S>5216</S> Father<S>3962</S>; and<S>2532</S> to my<S>3450</S> God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> your<S>5216</S> God<S>2316</S>.
Mary<S>3137</S> Magdalene<S>3094</S> came<S>2064</S> and told<S>518</S> the disciples<S>3101</S> that<S>3754</S> she had seen<S>3708</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>, and<S>2532</S> that he had spoken<S>2036</S> these things<S>5023</S> unto her<S>846</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> the same<S>1565</S> day<S>2250</S> at evening<S>3798</S>, being<S>5607</S> the first<S>3391</S> day of the week<S>4521</S>, when<S>2532</S> the doors<S>2374</S> were shut<S>2808</S> where<S>3699</S> the disciples<S>3101</S> were<S>2258</S> assembled<S>4863</S> for<S>1223</S> fear<S>5401</S> of the Jews<S>2453</S>, came<S>2064</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> and<S>2532</S> stood<S>2476</S> in<S>1519</S> the midst<S>3319</S>, and<S>2532</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Peace<S>1515</S> be unto you<S>5213</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when he had<S>2036</S> so<S>5124</S> said<S>2036</S>, he shewed<S>1166</S> unto them<S>846</S> his hands<S>5495</S> and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> side<S>4125</S>. Then<S>3767</S> were<S>5463</S> the disciples<S>3101</S> glad<S>5463</S>, when they saw<S>1492</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> said<S>2036</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> to them<S>846</S> again<S>3825</S>, Peace<S>1515</S> be unto you<S>5213</S>: as<S>2531</S> my Father<S>3962</S> hath sent<S>649</S> me<S>3165</S>, even so<S>2504</S> send<S>3992</S> I<S>2504</S> you<S>5209</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when he had said<S>2036</S> this<S>5124</S>, he breathed on<S>1720</S> them, and<S>2532</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Receive ye<S>2983</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>:
Whose<S>5100</S> soever<S>302</S> sins<S>266</S> ye remit<S>863</S>, they are remitted<S>863</S> unto them<S>846</S>; and whose<S>5100</S> soever<S>302</S> sins ye retain<S>2902</S>, they are retained<S>2902</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Thomas<S>2381</S>, one<S>1520</S> of<S>1537</S> the twelve<S>1427</S>, called<S>3004</S> Didymus<S>1324</S>, was<S>2258</S> not<S>3756</S> with<S>3326</S> them<S>846</S> when<S>3753</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> came<S>2064</S>.
The other<S>243</S> disciples<S>3101</S> therefore<S>3767</S> said<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, We have seen<S>3708</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>. But<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Except<S>3362</S> I shall see<S>1492</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> hands<S>5495</S> the print<S>5179</S> of the nails<S>2247</S>, and<S>2532</S> put<S>906</S> my<S>3450</S> finger<S>1147</S> into<S>1519</S> the print<S>5179</S> of the nails<S>2247</S>, and<S>2532</S> thrust<S>906</S> my<S>3450</S> hand<S>5495</S> into<S>1519</S> his<S>846</S> side<S>4125</S>, I will<S>4100</S> not<S>3364</S> believe<S>4100</S>.
And<S>2532</S> after<S>3326</S> eight<S>3638</S> days<S>2250</S> again<S>3825</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> were<S>2258</S> within<S>2080</S>, and<S>2532</S> Thomas<S>2381</S> with<S>3326</S> them<S>846</S>: then came<S>2064</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, the doors<S>2374</S> being shut<S>2808</S>, and<S>2532</S> stood<S>2476</S> in<S>1519</S> the midst<S>3319</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S>, Peace<S>1515</S> be unto you<S>5213</S>.
Then<S>1534</S> saith he<S>3004</S> to Thomas<S>2381</S>, Reach<S>5342</S> hither<S>5602</S> thy<S>4675</S> finger<S>1147</S>, and<S>2532</S> behold<S>1492</S> my<S>3450</S> hands<S>5495</S>; and<S>2532</S> reach hither<S>5342</S> thy<S>4675</S> hand<S>5495</S>, and<S>2532</S> thrust<S>906</S> it into<S>1519</S> my<S>3450</S> side<S>4125</S>: and<S>2532</S> be<S>1096</S> not<S>3361</S> faithless<S>571</S>, but<S>235</S> believing<S>4103</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Thomas<S>2381</S> answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, My<S>3450</S> Lord<S>2962</S> and<S>2532</S> my<S>3450</S> God<S>2316</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Thomas<S>2381</S>, because<S>3754</S> thou hast seen<S>3708</S> me<S>3165</S>, thou hast believed<S>4100</S>: blessed<S>3107</S> are they that have not<S>3361</S> seen<S>1492</S>, and<S>2532</S> yet have believed<S>4100</S>.
And<S>2532</S> many<S>4183</S> other<S>243</S> signs<S>4592</S> truly<S>3303</S> <S>3767</S> did<S>4160</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> in the presence<S>1799</S> of his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, which<S>3739</S> are<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> written<S>1125</S> in<S>1722</S> this<S>5129</S> book<S>975</S>:
But<S>1161</S> these<S>5023</S> are written<S>1125</S>, that<S>2443</S> ye might believe<S>4100</S> that<S>3754</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> is<S>2076</S> the Christ<S>5547</S>, the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>; and<S>2532</S> that<S>2443</S> believing<S>4100</S> ye might have<S>2192</S> life<S>2222</S> through<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S>.
